title: Friday the 13th effect? D-St investors suffer Rs 7 lakh crore shock as Sensex sinks over 1,000 points
desc: Indian stock markets ended sharply lower on Friday. The Sensex and Nifty saw significant drops. This decline was driven by a major selloff in IT stocks. Investor sentiment was rattled by fears of Artificial Intelligence disruption. Major IT companies experienced substantial losses. This led to a significant erosion of investor wealth on the BSE. The Nifty IT index slumped considerably.

title: Turramurra Music Marks 50 Years with Global NAMM Honours
desc: Turramurra Music has been named NAMM Best Community Retail Store and shortlisted as a global finalist for Retailer of the Year.

title: Averting the Next Disaster
desc: A global pandemic funding crisis threatens our ability to prevent the next major outbreak. Learn how cuts in health financing jeopardize lives worldwide.

title: Residents fume over planned air ambulance base near 'peaceful' North Wales village
desc: The charity says people will struggle to hear its helicopters over noise from the nearby A55

title: Muthoot Finance share price slumps 10% after Q3 results. Should you buy, sell or hold?
desc: Muthoot Finance share price dropped 10% on February 13 despite reporting a 94.9% increase in Q3 net profit to ₹2,656 crore. The net interest income rose 64% to ₹4,467 crore, while consolidated loan assets under management reached ₹1,64,720 crore, a 48% increase.

title: Katie Holmes pays tribute to Dawson's Creek co-star James Van Der Beek in handwritten letter
desc: Holmes says she is mourning the loss of her friend "with a heart holding the reality of his absence and deep gratitude for his imprint on it".

title: North Korea wants South to do more to prevent drone flights
desc: The sister of North Korean leader Kim Jong Un says it was “sensible” for a South Korean official to express regret for alleged civilian drone flights over North Korea but warned of counterattacks if they recur.

title: origami G-SHOCK watches by casio have washi paper texture
desc: casio’s origami-inspired G-SHOCK watches let the wearer feel the texture of washi paper around the accessory’s bezel and band.

title: NASA crew set for flight to ISS
desc: NASA is set to launch four astronauts to the International Space Station on Friday, replacing a crew that was evacuated early due to a medical issue.

title: Guntas Kaur Sandhu tied 17th after Round 1 of Women's Amateur Asia
desc: Part of the four-member team sent by the Indian Golf Union (IGU), Guntas began on a modest note with a bogey on the first hole before sinking birdies on the third, eighth and 12th holes. But a bogey on the 15th hole pegged her back. She trails the leader, Yunseo Yang of South Korea, by seven strokes.
